text: Hugh Graham (born 11 February 1949) is a Canadian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Equestrians at the 1983 Pan American Games Category:Equestrians at the 1987 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Guelph
title: Hugh Graham (equestrian)
